availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Clay County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Married to Nancy Bowling Roberts in Clay County, Kentucky, on July 1, 1826. Father of Mary Roberts, Elizabeth Roberts, Susan Roberts, Enoch Roberts, Washington Roberts, Rachael Roberts, Garrard Roberts, China Roberts, David P. Roberts, Daniel B. Roberts, Tennessee Roberts, Alabama Roberts, and Luticia Roberts. Farmer in Clay County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Clay County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clay County, Kentucky, p. 126A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clay County, p. 73.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clay County, Precinct 4, p. 198A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Clay County Marriages, Film 007728053.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 4977.
"Thomas Boone Roberts (1808-1870)," Find A Grave, Memorial 118698388, accessed December 8, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/118698388.
